dict.string: Need %d stardust, lack of stardust, you cannot upgrade!
Take %d stardust enhanced your drop rate of stardust to level %d!
You have reached the maximum level of stardust drop rate!
Take %d stardust enhanced your drop rate of reinforced props to level %d!
You have reached the maximum level of reinforced props drop rate!
Take %d stardust enhanced your effect or effect duration of reinforced props to level %d!
You have reached the maximum level of reinforced props effect or effect duration!
